data.text: @Dharma4X @jagdishshetty @colkt @RamyaBhat26 Yet another virtue of Dr Swamy ji he always is armed with facts and must be gathering inputs.With suhasini ji being an expert on the Foreign Affairs it’s but natural to take her inputs.

@Geethabhati @jagdishshetty @Swamy39 @RamyaBhat26 Geetha-jee: In this 2013 Leadership Summit photo, we can see distinctly that Suhasini is writing with her left hand only.. She is obviously a left-handed person.. https://t.co/UzJi12UXso

@Geethabhati @jagdishshetty @colkt @RamyaBhat26 Geetha-jee: PTs think that Dr. Swamy jee may hold some discussion or get input from Suhasini Haidar at home as she is a Senior Foreign Affairs Editor for "The Hindu" and she gets a lot of info from News Sources..
@Dharma4X @jagdishshetty @Swamy39 @RamyaBhat26 Going by this picture she seems to be a left handed person.

@Dharma4X @jagdishshetty @colkt @RamyaBhat26 Absolutely Dharma ji knowledge needs to be sought understood from all perspective every view point matters.A huge take away from all of Dr Swamy ji’s discussion is that his view point mightn’t match others but he respects them all for theirs,listens with an open mind That’s Great

@Geethabhati @jagdishshetty Geetha jee: Would you like to see Suhasini Haidar as a Special Guest in VHS Gyan Ganga show? She is an expert in foreign policy, right? Is she left-handed?

cc: @Swamy39 @RamyaBhat26 https://t.co/Guq7CadxaO

@Geethabhati @jagdishshetty Geetha jee: Would you like to see Suhasini Haidar as a Special Guest in VHS Gyan Ganga show? She is an expert in foreign policy, right? Kindly reply, thanks..

cc: @colkt @RamyaBhat26
